Body:
orig = [list(range(10)), [0, -0.025, -0.05, -0.075, -0.1, -0.125, -0.15, -
    0.175, -0.2, -0.225]]
l1 = range(1, 11)
l2 = [(40 - i) for i in range(10)]
d = {'1': l1, '2': l2}
df = pd.DataFrame(d)
ret = cumulative_returns(df)
assert all(abs(ret['1'].values - orig[0]) <= 1e-15)
assert all(abs(ret['2'].values - orig[1]) <= 1e-15)
orig = [[(0.2 + i) for i in range(10)], [0.005, -0.02, -0.045, -0.07, -
    0.095, -0.12, -0.145, -0.17, -0.195, -0.22]]
ret = cumulative_returns(df, 0.2)
assert all(abs(ret['1'].values - orig[0]) <= 1e-15)
assert all(abs(ret['2'].values - orig[1]) <= 1e-15)
